title: Arrest warrant issued against Bollywood actress Ameesha Patel
content:
A Ranchi court has issued an arrest warrant against Bollywood actress Ameesha Patel in a cheating and cheque bounce case, police said on Saturday. Ranchi police will go to Mumbai to execute the warrant which was issued on a complaint by Ajay Kumar Singh. "Ameesha Patel and her business partner Kunal had taken Rs 2.50 crore for making a film. They had assured to return the money after the release of the film in 2018. The film never released in 2018. When we approached Ameesha Patel for the money, she gave a cheque of Rs 3 crore, which bounced," said Ajay Singh in a press statement on Saturday. "Ameesha and her friend Kunal started ignoring my calls. The legal notice furnished by me was also not answered by the actress. I filed a complaint in the Ranchi district court last year. Now, the Ranchi court has issued a warrant against her," the statement said. Ameesha is also facing a cheating case, which accuses her of not attending an event in Ranchi after taking money. A complaint was lodged by the event company with the police in February this year.

 

source: https://photogallery.indiatimes.com/celebs/bollywood/teena-singh-is-raising-temperatures-with-her-glamorous-pictures/articleshow/71511878.cms

recommendations.title: Nirav Modi said he will kill himself if extradited to India
recommendations.content:
LONDON: Jailed diamantaire Nirav Modi told a UK court on Wednesday that he was beaten up “three times” in prison and threatened to kill himself if his extradition to India is ordered, but still a UK judge refused to grant him bail.
